title: EVote: Blockchain Voting System
description: A decentralized voting system built on Ethereum blockchain, ensuring transparency and security in elections.

title: OneKey-Deploy
description: A CLI tool for seamless deployment of applications to multiple cloud platforms with a single command.

title: Resume Builder
description: A Flutter-based application to create professional resumes with customizable templates and real-time previews.

title: Career Finder App
description: A Flutter-based AI-driven career guidance tool with skill assessments and personalized job recommendations.

title: GDGC AMU Backend
description: A Node.js/Express backend for a women safety app with OAuth, SOS functionality, and gamification features.

title: BeFocused Chrome Extension
description: A productivity powerhouse that helps users stay focused with distraction blocking, focus sprints, and activity analytics. Provides smart nudges and productivity insights based on your work patterns.
